about_the_game:
The Art of The Unliving - Digital Artbook:

An in-depth look into The Unliving unique aesthetic. Carefully selected by RocketBrush Studio, this selection of most appealing in-game graphics and visuals will immerse you even deeper in The Unliving experience!

Available in PDF format.
detailed_description:
The Art of The Unliving - Digital Artbook:

An in-depth look into The Unliving unique aesthetic. Carefully selected by RocketBrush Studio, this selection of most appealing in-game graphics and visuals will immerse you even deeper in The Unliving experience!
